---
title: Files & Outputs
description: Documentation for all PyGraft-gen configuration files and generated outputs.
---

# Files & Outputs

Documentation for all configuration files and generated outputs.

## Configuration (Input)

- :fontawesome-solid-sliders: **[Configuration](config.md)** - Main configuration file (`pygraft_config.json` or `.yml`)

## Extraction Output

- :fontawesome-solid-tag: **[Namespaces Info](namespaces-info.md)** - Namespace mappings (`namespaces_info.json`)
- :fontawesome-solid-sitemap: **[Class Info](class-info.md)** - Class hierarchy and constraints (`class_info.json`)
- :fontawesome-solid-link: **[Relation Info](relation-info.md)** - Property characteristics (`relation_info.json`)

## Generation Output

- :fontawesome-solid-chart-bar: **[KG Info](kg-info.md)** - Generation statistics (`kg_info.json`)
